oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Book Lovers Club
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Anderson, George H., photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Photographers
African American women; Book clubs (Discussion groups); Young Women's Christian Association of the U.S.A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A picture of the Book Lovers Club at the Blue Triangle Y.W.C.A. in Nashville.

This photograph was taken by George H. Anderson, an African American photographer in Nashville. His studio, Anderson's Studio, was located at 417 Cedar Street (now Charlotte Avenue) in the heart of the African American downtown business district in Nashville.
